hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT P.Year, P.Number, P.Object, Convert(varchar, DL.year) + '/' + Right('0000000' + Convert(varchar, DL.number), 7) AS Codice, DL.LogDate, Type='Docm', DL.PI , DL.PS , DL.PD , DL.PZ , PM = 0 , AdoptionDate = CAST(NULL as datetime) , IsHandled = 0 FROM Document P INNER JOIN ( SELECT DL.Year, DL.Number, MAX(DL.LogDate) as LogDate, SUM(CASE DL.LogType WHEN 'DI' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS PI, SUM(CASE DL.LogType WHEN 'DS' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS PS, SUM(CASE DL.LogType WHEN 'DD' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS PD, SUM(CASE DL.LogType WHEN 'DZ' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS PZ FROM DocumentLog AS DL WHERE DL.SystemUser = :SystemUser AND DL.LogDate >= :LogDateFrom AND DL.LogDate <= :LogDateTo GROUP BY DL.Year, DL.Number ) as DL ON DL.Year = P.Year AND DL.Number = P.Number ORDER BY DL.LogDate DESC
